description:
In this course you'll learn how to create web animations with the GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP).

The GreenSock Animation Platform is a JavaScript framework which provides a fast, performance-optimized, framework for creating web animations.

This course will take you from building multiple to single tween animations, and introduce techniques for combining animations, rearranging elements, and jumping to specific points in the animation for testing.

By the end of this course you'll learn everything you need to get the most our of GSAP and you'll not only learn how to use GSAP, but you will gain a solid understanding of how the many components work together.
title: Learn the GreenSock Animation Platform
